ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Druid flying solo, mostly.
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm... Maybe I can just get a tp to Misty Thicket and hunt the goblins and orcs there.. I didn t know I could get a tp there before... luv, -Su ... Misty ...
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm... Maybe I can just get a tp to Misty Thicket and hunt the goblins and
orcs there..
I didn't know I could get a tp there before...
luv,
-Su

> If your KoS in Rivervale the easiest way to runnyeye is get a port to
Misty
> Thicket. Follow the path to the wall and head straight out from the wall
you
> will come to another wall. There is a cave in that wall, runnyeye is
there.
> I dont think its that good personally, find a group lots of runners and
> roamers.
>
> Mu
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Su [mailto:suceress@...]
> Sent: Saturday, May 19, 2001 6:56 PM
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Druid flying solo, mostly.
>
>
>
> Yeah. I'm not high enough to kill orcs regularly though. Hm.. how do I get
> to runnyeye? and what lvls?
> luv,
> -Su
>
> > Runnyeye. Kill gobs. High Pass. Kill Orcs. I believe that will build
> > the needed faction.
> >
> > --- In EverQuest@y..., "Su" <suceress@s...> wrote:
> > > That reminds me, where can I hunt to get my faction good with the
> > people of
> > > Rivervale -- without actually having to enter Rivervale (bc I'm
> > KOS)?
> > > (thought of faction when I remembered something about my faction in
> > CB)
> > > luv,
> > > -Su
> > >
> > > > that was my idea too...
> > > >
> > > > snare, dot, panic animal, burn, burn, burn,
> > > > resnare, panic animal, whack it, whack it, whack it...
> > > >
> > > > play PS2 while mana regens
> > > >
> > > > repeat...
> > > >
> > > > boring after a bit..
> > > >
> > > > at 14 go to nro or oasis and join a group there
> > > >
> > > > from 12 - 15 though...i can suggest the throne room of Crushbone
> > if you
> > > can
> > > > get a good group together
> > > >
> > > > > -----Original Message-----
> > > > > From: MLockridge01@c... [SMTP:MLockridge01@c...]
> > > > > Sent: Wednesday, May 02, 2001 10:28 PM
> > > > > To: EverQuest@y...
> > > > > Subject: [EverQuest] Druid flying solo, mostly.
> > > > >
> > > > > I am developing a halfling druid for mostly solo play. I group
> > once
> > > > > in a while, but prefer to develop solo skills. I am a
> > relatively new
> > > > > player, so I am not sure just where I am going.
> > > > >
> > > > > My current goal is attaining level 14, to gain SOW and bind. I
> > then
> > > > > plan to begin traveling and picking up some of the little
> > quests.
> > > > >
> > > > > I am drawn initially toward the Commons. Any suggestions as to
> > what
> > > > > interesting low-level solo quests might be in that area?
> > > > >
> > > > > Barto of Rivervale.
